name: frijole
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C usually plural ] any bean that is used in Mexican cooking: You can buy your frijoles tinned, dried, or fresh. Jalapeño peppers are often used to enhance the flavour of frijoles.
[ plural ] (also frijoles refritos) beans that are cooked and mashed (= partly crushed), popular in Mexican cooking: The beans do not go into the chilli itself, but are served as a side dish, usually as frijoles. My tortilla was stuffed with cheese and frijoles. Synonym
refried beans
More examplesFewer examplesWe never cook frijoles with meat.Most of the local restaurants only served chilli and frijoles.The little shop always smells like frijoles.
